name: StartUP LunchBox
overview:
StartUP LunchBox provides resources to help startups and entrepreneurs launch and run their businesses faster and at a lower cost.

StartUP LunchBox is comprised of 4 sections:

  1. Resource Database: 2,000 service providers and tools in over 90 different categories. The database also has a special focus on highlighting free tools and services.
  2. Investor Database is comprised of 1,000 investors of which roughly 300 are Angel and Seed Funds as well as 200 crowdfunding platforms, plus proposal hosting sites and VC funds
  3. Articles which provide practical “how to” advice about starting up for less using the services and tools in our databases.
  4. Templates - legal and financial templates
